name: phishing-awareness-demo
description: Educational phishing awareness demonstration with all malicious functionality disabled. Shows how sophisticated phishing attacks operate for security training purposes only.

scripts.educational-demo: echo 'Starting educational phishing awareness demo...' && node index.js
scripts.disabled-bot: echo 'Discord bot functionality has been disabled for educational safety' && node discord-bot.js
scripts.disabled-membership: echo 'Membership server functionality has been disabled for educational safety'

author: Educational Security Demonstration
